commit.message:
Rollup merge of #92744 - lambinoo:I-91161-non-exhaustive-foreign-variants, r=scottmcm

Check if enum from foreign crate has any non exhaustive variants when attempting a cast

Fixes #91161

As stated in the issue, this will require a crater run as it might break other people's stuff.

verification.payload:
tree e9c96f2a78972194771fde07be96f6e1a7646b39
parent 187654481fd828e495919295369d33827f10e1c4
parent dfb3713cdb7303a250d8b23792fe801319edf36c
author Dylan DPC <99973273+Dylan-DPC@users.noreply.github.com> 1660196690 +0530
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1660196690 +0530

Rollup merge of #92744 - lambinoo:I-91161-non-exhaustive-foreign-variants, r=scottmcm

Check if enum from foreign crate has any non exhaustive variants when attempting a cast

Fixes #91161

As stated in the issue, this will require a crater run as it might break other people's stuff.

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+error[E0606]: casting `FieldLessWithNonExhaustiveVariant` as `u8` is invalid
+  --> $DIR/enum-as-cast.rs:9:13
+   |
+LL |     let d = e as u8;
+   |             ^^^^^^^
+   |
+   = note: cannot cast an enum with a non-exhaustive variant when it's defined in another crate
+
+error: aborting due to previous error
+
+For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0606`.
